metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8861 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The handlebars package before 4.0.0 for Node.js allows remote attackers toconduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks by leveraging a template with anattribute that is not quoted.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8861` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

handlebars - 3:4.0.10-5
libjs-handlebars - 3:4.0.10-5
libjs-handlebars.runtime - 3:4.0.10-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-handlebars package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3:4.0.10-5').
